mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meeting ( maintitle, subtitle, date, hostid, detail, categoryno, file) VALUES ( #{maintitle}, #{subtitle}, #{date}, #{hostid},#{detail},#{categoryno},#{file})
mapper.select: SELECT no AS meetingno, maintitle, subtitle, date, hostid, detail, categoryno, file FROM meeting ORDER BY no
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM participation WHERE meetingno=#{meetingno}; DELETE FROM meeting WHERE no=#{meetingno};
